original_text: And it came to pass, when Laban heard the tidings of Jacob his sister's son, that he ran to meet him, and embraced him, and kissed him, and brought him to his house. And he told Laban all these things.
korean_text: 라반이 그의 생질 야곱의 소식을 듣고 달려와서 그를 영접하여 안고 입맞추며 자기 집으로 인도하여 들이니 야곱이 자기의 모든 일을 라반에게 말하매

sentences.original_text: when Laban heard the tidings of Jacob his sister's son,
sentences.korean_translation: 라반이 그의 누이의 아들 야곱의 소식을 들었을 때,

sentences.original_text: that he ran to meet him,
and brought him to his house.
And he told Laban all these things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 라반에게 이 모든 일을 말했다.
